PLAYER/GetHandsModel.description: Called on player spawn to determine which hand model to use

PLAYER/Init.description: Called when the class object is created

PLAYER/Loadout.description: Called on spawn to give the player their default loadout

PLAYER/PostDrawViewModel.description: Called after the viewmodel has been drawn

PLAYER/PreDrawViewModel.description: Called before the viewmodel is drawn

PLAYER/SetModel.description: Called when we need to set player model from the class.

PLAYER/SetupDataTables.description: Set up the network table accessors

PLAYER/ViewModelChanged.description: Called when the player changes their weapon to another one causing their viewmodel model to change
